subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers have been trying to work out a deal involving Doc Rivers, Boston’s Kevin Garnett and first-round draft picks, but the N.B.A. may not approve it.
snippet: The Los Angeles Clippers have been trying to work out a deal involving Doc Rivers, Boston’s Kevin Garnett and first-round draft picks, but the N.B.A. may not approve it.
